import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link, useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Navbar = () => { const { user, logout } = useAuth(); const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isMobileMenuOpen, setIsMobileMenuOpen] = useState(false); const handleLogout = () => { logout(); navigate('/'); }; const toggleMobileMenu = () => { setIsMobileMenuOpen(!isMobileMenuOpen); }; return (
{/* Logo */}
B
Blood Tracker
{/* Navigation Links */}
Home Blood Availability Blood Centers Donation Camps {user && user.role === 'Admin' && ( Admin Dashboard )} {user && ( Schedule Directory )} Learn
{/* Auth Buttons */}
{user ? (
Welcome, {user.name || 'User'}
) : (
Login Register
)}
{/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile Navigation */}
setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Home setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Blood Availability setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Blood Centers setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Donation Camps {user && user.role === 'Admin' && ( setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Admin Dashboard )} {user && ( setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Schedule Directory )} setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Learn {user ? (
Welcome, {user.name || 'User'}
) : (
setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Login setIsMobileMenuOpen(false)} > Register
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
